Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Phylloxin-B1 (PLX-B1; phylloxin, natural AMPs; UCLL1a; frog, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: Two-colored leaf frog,Phyllomedusa bicolor, South America

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against C. glutamicum ATCC 27853 (MIC 1.56 uM), M. luteus A270 (MIC 3.0 uM), B. megaterium KM (MIC 3.12 uM), A. laidlawii A-PG8, R. meliloti 102F34 (MIC 12.5 uM) and S. melliferum BC3 (MIC 50 uM).  Authors predicted that the peptide can be configured as an amphipathic helix spanning residues 1-19. Updated 4/2019; 7//2021.
Literature Information.Author: Pierre TP, Seon AA, Amiche M, Nicolas P.2000
Literature Information.Title: Phylloxin, a novel peptide antibiotic of the dermaseptin family of antimicrobial/opioid peptide precursors.
